summary: Convert special characters to HTML entities.
name: htmlspecialchars
description:
This plugin provides commands to convert special characters of HTML to entities.

Usage:
	:[range]HTMLSpecialChars
	:[range]HTMLSpecialCharsDecode

Manual:
	:help htmlspecialchars.txt
install_details:
The plugin uses Vimball plugin archive format.
To install the package, load the file to Vim and run command

    :source %

To remove the plugin, type

    :RmVimball htmlspecialchars
